SmoothedPath Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class takes an interpolated series of control points, and every time a new point is added, it smooths the third-most-recent-point using a Catmull-Rom spline.

This will smooth out most paths, however if the frame-rate is poor, and the interpolation is relatively high, what you will see is a fairly angular path, with smoothed corners.
